data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 33 believers in Maccarthy Island, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maccarthy Island, Gambia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Maccarthy Island. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Maccarthy Island, Gambia know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Maccarthy Island, Gambia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Jarreng
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Jarreng, Maccarthy Island, Gambia.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Maccarthy Island, Gambia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 3,567 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 33 believers in the state of Maccarthy Island to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 33 believers in Maccarthy Island to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 3,567 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.
